channel.title: stephen-kuenzli on Cash Weaver
channel.description: Recent content in stephen-kuenzli on Cash Weaver

item.title: Key practices for achieving large professional goals
item.description: Summary I attribute much of my success in 2019 to the practices of: writing to develop my thoughts learning to focus I wrote a lot in 2019 … This practice of writing resulted in a couple major changes: I now use writing as a primary mechanism to develop my thoughts on a subject Writing is now a healthy habit for my professional skills and business Kuenzli mentions that they “really learned how to focus and extract much more value out of the time I have available”.
